mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO bot.trade_history ( tranId, price, symbol, qty, quoteQty, isBestMatch, isBuyerMaker, time ) VALUES ( #{tranId}, #{price}, #{symbol}, #{qty}, #{quoteQty}, #{isBestMatch}, #{isBuyerMaker}, #{time} )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, tranId, price, symbol, qty, quoteQty, isBestMatch, isBuyerMaker, time FROM bot.trade_history WHERE 1=1
AND time >= #{start} AND time <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade_volume_report ( symbol, volume, avg_price, date_hour) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{symbol}, SUM(qty) qty, AVG(price), LEFT(FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(`time`, 10)), 16) AS date_hour FROM trade_history WHERE `time` >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day )), '000') AND symbol = #{pair} GROUP BY LEFT(FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(`time`, 10)), 16) ) A ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE volume = A.qty, updated_at = now()
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(A.volume / B.volume) AS tradeVolumeIncreaseRate, B.avg_price - A.avg_price AS priceMovingAmount FROM (SELECT volume, avg_price FROM trade_volume_report WHERE symbol = '${value}' ORDER BY id DESC limit 1) A, (SELECT volume, avg_price FROM trade_volume_report WHERE symbol = '${value}' ORDER BY id DESC limit 1,1) B
